description: President-elect Donald Trump said the New York Republican would help push deregulation and support American businesses. Environmental groups decried the nomination.
title: Trump picks former Rep. Lee Zeldin to be his EPA administrator

description: Haiti's international airport shut down temporarily after gangs opened fire at a Spirit Airlines flight landing in Port-Au-Prince. The latest violence came as a new prime minister was sworn in.
title: Haiti swears in a new leader as gangs shoot at a flight landing in the main airport

description: Wetlands managers have spent years using fire and chemicals to fight phragmites, an invasive reed that chokes everything else out. But coaxing beneficial native plants to move back in is difficult.
title: You might beat back phragmites, the scourge of wetlands, but then what?

description: A research facility in Yemassee, S.C., has recovered 25 of the 43 monkeys that escaped from the laboratory last week after a caretaker accidentally left the door to their enclosure unsecured.
title: 25 of 43 monkeys have been recovered after escaping a lab in South Carolina last week

description: One of the architects of Trump's family separation policy during his first time in office, Miller will return to the White House in a key role.
title: Stephen Miller is heading back to the White House as Trump's deputy chief of staff

description: The North and South Taurids occur every year in September, October, and November. They may have originated from a comet that broke up about 10,000 years ago.
title: Taurid meteor shower to light up the night sky. Here's how you can see it

description: The president-elect recently affirmed that he supports legalizing marijuana for recreational use. His stance means cannabis could be a rare issue on which Trump carries a Biden policy forward.
title: Trump plans to revoke many Biden policies. Where does that leave marijuana?

description: Essayist Phil Klay says Trump tried to use the military to push his partisan agenda before, and may further erode norms around the military as he looks for those willing to "go with his whims."
title: A Marine Corps veteran expresses concerns for the military in a 2nd Trump presidency

description: Jamison was a dance star, who led the famed Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater to new heights.
title: Dance pioneer Judith Jamison dies at 81

description: Homan was the acting director of Immigration and Customs Enforcement from January 2017 to June 2018, where he was a key architect of the Trump administration's controversial family separation policy.
title: What to know about Tom Homan, the former ICE head returning as Trump's 'border czar'

description: Stefanik, who is the House Republican Conference Chair, has been a key ally of Trump's over the years and was reported to have been a contender as his running mate during the presidential election.
title: Trump taps House Rep. Elise Stefanik as U.N. ambassador

description: These races will determine who controls the House. Plus, an NPR investigation found thousands of veterans were pushed into high-cost mortgages and now a rescue plan cannot help them all.
title: The fight over control of the House. And, veterans stung by botched home program

description: Trump’s return to the White House raises questions about whether the country will continue working on global climate initiatives.
title: Trump’s reelection casts a shadow over the start of global climate negotiations

description: A study of cells from 84 brains finds that Alzheimer’s has two distinct phases, and that one type of neuron is especially vulnerable.
title: Alzheimer’s timeline shows changes start as trickle, become torrent

description: The Wisconsin Supreme Court will hear oral arguments Monday on whether a law that legislators adopted more than a decade before the Civil War bans abortion and can still be enforced.
title: Wisconsin high court to hear arguments on whether an 1849 abortion ban remains valid

description: Israel's ousted defense minister says the military achieved all of its Gaza objectives, and the prime minister held up a cease-fire deal that would have ended the war and freed remaining hostages.
title: Israel's fired defense minister slams Netanyahu on his last day

description: The creators behind the viral TikTok account @lifeonfilm.27 give film cameras to strangers all over the world. In September, they handed one to one of the most powerful men in the world.
title: Biden was given a film camera. The result? A new, intimate view of the White House

description: An NPR investigation finds thousands of veterans were pushed into high-cost mortgages by a program that was meant to help them. A rescue plan being rolled out by the Department of Veterans Affairs is excluding many vets who need help.
title: It’s Veterans Day. The VA says it can’t help thousands of vets it left stranded

description: More people are getting cancer in their 20s, 30s, and 40s, and surviving, thanks to rapid advancement in care. Many will have decades of life ahead of them, which means they face greater and more complex challenges in survivorship. Lourdes Monje is navigating these waters at age 29.
title: More young people are surviving cancer. Then they face a life altered by it

description: After her car key broke, Betsy Cornwell was stranded and all alone. Then the unlikeliest of heroes came to her aid.
title: When her key broke in the ignition, a car thief saved the day

description: It marks even more turmoil in an already rocky democratic transition process for Haiti, which hasn't held democratic elections in years in a large part due to the soaring levels of gang violence.
title: Haiti replaces its prime minister, marking more turmoil in transition process
